name: Count 1 to 10 FREE
description: Count 1 to 10 FREE is a simple app helping teach early years numeracy.  Tap a number! See that number of items! Hear the number spoken aloud!  Teach preschool and primary school children to count from one to ten in eight languages: English French (Franais) German (Deutsch) Italian (Italiano) Japanese (Nihongo ) Mandarin Chinese (Gunhu  ) Spanish (Espaol) Welsh (Cymraeg)  Fun early learning counting app for young kids - I hope you and your children enjoy playing with this free educational tool.
